REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1244 reute r f BC-XIDEX-<XIDX.O>-NAMES 10-19 0058

TEXT.TITLE: XIDEX <XIDX.O> NAMES NEW CHIEF EXECUTIVE
TEXT.BODY: Xidex Corp said Lester L. Colbert Jr. will be succeeded as president and chief executive officer by executive vice president and chief operating officer Bert Zaccaria but will remain chairman. The company said Colbert has decided to take a less active role in management. Reuter
